newsitem.title: USA: U.S. exporters report soyoil sold to China -- USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. exporters report soyoil sold to China -- USDA.

text.p: U.S. Agriculture Department said private exporters reported sales of 20,000 tonnes soybean oil for delivery to China during the 1996/97 marketing year.
The marketing year for soybean oil began Oct 1.
USDA issues daily and weekly export sales reports.
Exporters must report to USDA sales of 20,000 tonnes or more soybean oil made in one day to a single destination by 1500 ET the next business day after the sale.
Sales of lesser quantities must be reported weekly.
